title: Marble Machine Flywheel Prototype - DAY 1
description:
Woot Woot! We are getting started on a really fun week with some IRL building of a Flywheel prototype. The prototype is designed to answer the age old question: Can I play tight music using a very strong flywheel? The new flywheel have 20x more moment of inertia compared to the MMX Flywheel.

We are recording at the wonderful location of Siegfrieds Mechanical Music Museum in Rudesheim Am Rhein, Germany. The museum will livestream the upcoming Wintergatan meetup 4-6 august on their youtube channel, check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/@Musikkabinett

Edited By the Glorious Hannes Knutsson From the @Trainerds  Youtube Channel
Trainerds: https://www.youtube.com/@Trainerds

We are trying to make one video per day until the project is completed, so check back tomorrow for Part 2! Ciao!

—
